sections.title: Return value optimization
sections.content:
**This page has been archived**

It did not actually reflect current language guarantees and caused frequent confusion.

The old content can be accessed on GitHub.

paragraphs.ucg_return_value_optimization_p2: It did not actually reflect current language guarantees and caused frequent confusion.
